ControlType.DataSourceTypeName: select code,name,' ', spell_code,wb_code,mark from com_dictionary where type = 'HOSPITALLIST'
select empl_code id,empl_name name,'' oth,spell_code,wb_code,'' memo from com_employee where empl_type = 'F'

QueryDataSource.Name: dtRegister
QueryDataSource.Sql: select /*(select a.hospital_name from com_department a where a.dept_code = (select dept_code from com_employee b where b.empl_code = t.oper_code)) hospital,*/ (select a.hospital_name from com_department a where a.dept_code = (select distinct b.dept_code from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code)) hospital, (case when t.cancel_flag = '1' and t.trans_type = '1' then t.invoice_no when t.cancel_flag = '0' and t.trans_type = '1' then '[退费]'||t.invoice_no when t.cancel_flag = '0' and t.trans_type = '2' then '[退费]'||t.invoice_no else '[未知]'||t.invoice_no end) invoice_no, t.name, t.card_no, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type） hj, -- (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '01') xyf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '02') zyf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '03') ghf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '04') zcf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '05') jcf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '06') jyf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '07') zlf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '08') ssf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '09') mzf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '10') hlf, -- (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '11') clf, --(select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and invo_code = '12') qtf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '01' and b.report_code='MZ01') xyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '02' and b.report_code='MZ01') zyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '03' and b.report_code='MZ01') ghf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '04' and b.report_code='MZ01') zcf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '05' and b.report_code='MZ01') jcf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '06' and b.report_code='MZ01') jyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '07' and b.report_code='MZ01') zlf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '08' and b.report_code='MZ01') ssf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '09' and b.report_code='MZ01') mzf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '10' and b.report_code='MZ01') hlf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '11' and b.report_code='MZ01') clf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_opb_feedetail a ,fin_com_feecodestat b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.fee_code=b.fee_code and b.fee_stat_cate = '12' and b.report_code='MZ01') qtf, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'CA') ca, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'CH') ch, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'CI') ci, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'PO') po, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'UP') pos, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'ZB') zb, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'YE') ye, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'YS') ys, (select wm_concat(fa.empower_name) empower_name from fin_opb_invoiceinfo t1 left join fin_opb_paymode fp on fp.invoice_no=t1.invoice_no and fp.trans_type=t1.trans_type and fp.mode_code='YS' left join fin_opb_accountrecord fa on fa.pay_invoiceno=fp.invoice_no and fa.account_no=fp.pay_accountno and fa.base_money=-fp.real_cost where t1.card_no=t.card_no and t1.invoice_no=t.invoice_no and t1.trans_type=t.trans_type ) zhm, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'DC') dc, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'PR') pr, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'PD') pd, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'PY') PY, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'PYZZ') pyzz, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'RC') rc, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'WP') wp, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'CO') jf, (select nvl(sum(a.tot_cost),0) from fin_opb_paymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.mode_code = 'TCO') tjf, (select distinct a.empl_name from com_employee a where a.empl_code = t.oper_code) sfy, (select distinct a.dept_name from com_department a where a.dept_code = (select distinct b.dept_code from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code)) ghks, (select distinct a.empl_name from com_employee a where a.empl_code = (select distinct nvl(b.see_docd,b.doct_code) from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code)) kdys, (select distinct b.real_doct_name from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code) sjkdys, t.oper_date operdate ,(select wm_concat(case when a.mark is not null then b.name||':' else '' end||a.mark) from fin_opb_paymode a,com_dictionary b where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and b.type='PAYMODES' and b.code=a.mode_code) 备注 from fin_opb_invoiceinfo t where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+1 and ((select distinct b.dept_code from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code) = '&cmbDept' or '&cmbDept' = 'ALL') and (t.oper_code = '&cmbFeeOper' or '&cmbFeeOper' = 'ALL') --and (t.name like '%&txtName%' or '&txtName' is null) and ( (t.name like '%&txtName%' or '&txtName' is null) or (t.card_no like '%&txtName%' or '&txtName' is null )) and ( (select distinct b.doct_code from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code) = '&cmbDoctor' or '&cmbDoctor' = 'ALL') and t.oper_code in (select empl_code from com_employee where empl_type = 'F') and ((select a.hospital_id from com_department a where a.dept_code = (select distinct b.dept_code from fin_opr_register b where b.clinic_code = t.clinic_code) ) = '&cmbHospital' or '&cmbHospital' = 'ALL') order by t.invoice_no,t.trans_type

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: \Report\门诊财务报表\爱博恩\门诊收费统计设置.xml
